website_summaries.verdict: Durable, leakproof food storage containers perfect for babies just beginning solid foods.
pros: Clear, so you can quickly see what is inside
cons: 2-ounce size may not be enough for older infants

customer_reviews.title: Shattered after freezing!
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed in these. They claim to be for freezing, heating, and storing but I froze food for my 6 mo old overnight and in the AM dropped one on the counter (less than a ft drop) and it shattered! Not the quality I was expecting from this brand. I emailed the company but no one has gotten back to me. Very disappointing. If you are a multi-tasking mama and can’t afford to be extra careful with these, skip them and buy something more durable. EDIT: The company did respond to my email and are sending me a replacement! I will definitely give them another shot because they are such a convenient size.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: So they are super cute and convenient. However, do not buy these if you plan on making a bunch and freezing them! They bust open, shatter and crack after being frozen. But they did fine if I made a little at a time a stores them in the fridge. Honestly.. there are much better baby food storage containers than these out there. I bought two orders at the same time thinking they would be perfect... all of them GARBAGE. All in the trash!!
customer_reviews.author: ~C

customer_reviews.title: Great product, however not for us.
customer_reviews.text: I got them because some YouTuber recommended them for baby food but so far they haven't been as convenient for us as I thought they would be, they're just sitting in our pantry. They're good whenever we have some 2oz leftover food. We found a better system by just using Mason jars and serving the portions that we need each meal. The quality of the product is great, it's good material and it freezes without a problem. If I could change anything I'd probably just get a bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Hine

customer_reviews.title: Shatters when frozen and dropped.
customer_reviews.text: Great for serving out of, but if they fall on the floor from the freezer the tops shatter... 100% of the time. Totally fine if you don’t have an over stuffed freezer like mine. I think I’ve broken at least 6 tops since buying these several months ago... the bottoms and tray are now useless of course.
customer_reviews.author: MonPetitChou

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use; easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: These are great little food containers for baby food (or condiments lol). I typically disassemble the lid into 2 pieces before putting in the dishwasher, but if there’s food around the gasket then I’ll take that out too. It’s not that hard to get out and you could use a butter knife if your fingernails are really short or weak. The inner piece of the lid has indentations in two sides. I’ve found that the lid snaps onto the container more easily if I line up the indentations with snap sides of the outer ring, rather than doing it the other way.
customer_reviews.author: lenergyrlah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect condiment storage.
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend use to re-use these cheapy disposable condiment containers that you would get with your to-go chips and salsa. It drove me up the damn wall seeing garbage in my cupboards. That's where these come in; I bought these as they're perfect for her to take condiments with her for her lunches. Works like a charm! Doesn't leak, easy to clean, stackable, these are the business.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Baby registry must have!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these little containers. I use them to store my homemade baby food. They are a breeze to clean I throw them on the top rack of the dishwasher. I use them in the freezer and the refrigerator.They are also microwavable. This is a must have product for moms. You can even put snack for older kids in these. They are spill proof and travel easily.
customer_reviews.author: Cydney

customer_reviews.title: I want more!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve read a lot of reviews about this product saying the plastic breaks when frozen and dropped and my only thought is that of course that happens to frozen plastic when dropped! Just like cold glass cracks if you put it directly in the oven. That’s just the nature of the material. With that said, these are the absolute best baby food containers. I love have they seal and they are super easy to use. I ended up ordering a total of 8 sets and want to get more!
customer_reviews.author: ashley hampton

customer_reviews.title: No leaks out, water gets in
customer_reviews.text: My husband tried to thaw out some puree that had been in the freezer in one of these containers. He set the container in hot water (not wanting to microwave plastic) and let it set. After a while we checked it and noticed water had gotten in through the top. I haven't taken it on the go yet, but if you intend to freeze and then thaw food in it, I recommend planning ahead and putting it in the fridge at least 24 hours before you plan to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Antatia Post

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, portions and NO LEAKS!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these contains. There 100% true to the description. They don’t leak, perfect portion size and very easy to clean. I feed my youngest daughter her rice cereal in these and the best part is it tells you on the size how much your baby is eating. These were definitely worth the buy and I plan on buying one more pack of 6 to have for once she starts eating baby food.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie M

customer_reviews.title: Must have for those that make baby food
customer_reviews.text: The tray they set in is worth it alone. You dont have to worry about them flipping over in the small ridges in the freezer or getting knocked over in the fridge. The containers are a tad small for me but super durable, easy to seal, easy to clean. If they were a little larger I wouldn't have to use 2 to feed the baby. He eats 1.5
customer_reviews.author: Love to shop

customer_reviews.title: Great baby food containers
customer_reviews.text: I love these containers! I make all of my baby’s food and portion everything in these. Love the tray so that I can make a lot of food at one time, fill them up, and stack in the freezer. I started with one set and now have 3! They’re the perfect size to toss in the diaper bag on the go or to thaw at home for a meal. The seal is great and they’re easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jilian

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my lunch and they are great. Nice size to put in my lunch bag and they do not leak. Come apart nice to wash and dry. I am happy I gave them a try!
customer_reviews.author: Lucinda M. Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Its good
customer_reviews.text: I liked that these were affordable and that it came with a bunch. It was leak proof and had the right portion size to freeze our toddler foods during meal prep days. It was kida difficult to clean smif there was oily food stored in it. As a note2 has broke from regular wear and tear after 6 months of use
customer_reviews.author: KenGsaur

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality baby food containers
customer_reviews.text: Love that these come with a tray for easy storage in freezer also they fit perfectly in my Avent bottle warmer which I prefer to use instead of the microwave I just put it in the highest setting and its ready in 10 min or so.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Correa

customer_reviews.title: Leak proof
customer_reviews.text: These are great little tubs. They only hold one frozen cube though so I usually put two frozen cube in it in the microwave for 15 seconds to get them to melt just enough to fit the lid on for the fridge. Great quality and leak proof. We’ve also been using them for salad dressing when packing lunches.
customer_reviews.author: mbh

customer_reviews.title: Great containers for homemade baby food
customer_reviews.text: I am a first time mom and after deciding to make my own "baby food" I stumbled across these gems. I love these containers! First, they are easy to use, break down well for cleaning and freeze well. I love that they are stackable and a nice durable plastic. I was able to warm defrosted veggies in a bowl of warm water and there was no water leakage. I will be buying more for my little girl.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great quality material
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these when I started to intruduce solids to my baby and am very happy with the quality and durability of the material. I have not put them on the microwave because I rather reheat my baby’s food on hot water, but they are resistant to high temperatures and easy to clean. I gave them 4 stars bucause for their size, I think they’re a little pricey.
customer_reviews.author: arleen iglesias

customer_reviews.title: Great containers for baby
customer_reviews.text: Being used for baby food I make and send to daycare. I freeze ice cube trays of purées and can fit up to 3 cubes in one (if cubes are frozen you have to heat it for a second to close the lid). Great for sending to daycare and has held up being washed all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great for baby food!
customer_reviews.text: I just placed another order for two more sets, as I absolutely love these! I make up all of our baby food and freeze it. These keep the food well, and they are easily transportable. They are easy to clean, which is a huge plus. I bought all three colors and use one for fruit, one for veggies, and then one for protein rich purées. It’s great because my husband can pull one of each and ensure that we are balancing what the baby is eating. I can even envision using these beyond baby food. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Korl

customer_reviews.title: Not only for children
customer_reviews.text: I had gastric sleeve less than a month ago and I can only eat 2 oz at a time. These containers are so easy to use and helps me control my portions. The tray that it comes with is amazing also. You can put all of this in the dishwasher and the containers in the microwave.
customer_reviews.author: DORI1130

customer_reviews.title: Satins easy and leaks
customer_reviews.text: These containers are thick plastic but seem to stain very easy. I put homemade baby carrots in them and stain..I hand washed them with soap and water three times then the dishwasher still stain. I feel like they shouldn't stain that easy. The pricing is good but I wouldn't purchase them again..
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Bowden

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for baby food!
customer_reviews.text: My 2nd child is still on 1st foods and I love using these to mix them in. They are great! And I love the floating lid because I use the 2 x 2 Full Sticky Post Its to label her food for daycare and they fit great in between the outer ring and the lid. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: BLUEFIRENICE

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money terrible quality!
customer_reviews.text: I’m very upset I JUST purchased this item didn’t even get to use them yet. I received this yesterday put it in the dishwasher as instructed & when I go to take them out the dishwasher they broke. Very disappointing and waste of money :(
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Not Just for Baby!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter to use in her science fair project. These are extremely well-made, are the perfect size for baby food portions, food prep, freezing leftover tomato paste and other small measurements of ingredients, and of course, science fair projects. These are also ideal for salad dressings/peanut butter/raisins for packed lunches.
customer_reviews.author: M. Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Very useful!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to store homemade baby food. Perfect for 5-7 months when they don’t eat too much at one time. Easy to clean and don’t leak! Will need to get something bigger as baby grows but we’ll end up using these for dipping sauces or other things too.
customer_reviews.author: taylor.mb

customer_reviews.title: Great for making your own baby food!
customer_reviews.text: Cute, perfect size, water tight makes them easy to warm up! ( just heat up a bowl of water and then chuck one in! Or throw it in your bottle warmer) the tray is also really convient: u don’t have to worry about bumping them around in your fridge and loosing one in the back.
customer_reviews.author: Kay M

customer_reviews.title: We use these every day!
customer_reviews.text: I love these containers. We make all our own baby food and these containers fit many of the silicon square shaped ice cube trays. I can make a big batch and then just pull a few cubes out to pop into these containers and have meals thawed in the fridge for days. Only one has broken from falling (frozen) out of the freezer. We use these every day!
customer_reviews.author: L. Mathias

customer_reviews.title: Came back for more!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect baby food containers. Convenient size, leak proof, easy to fill and keep organized with the tray. I had two sets for the first kid and came back to get even more with kid number two to make prepping/freezing food easier.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Ledbetter

customer_reviews.title: Great little containers
customer_reviews.text: Love these little containers for my baby’s lunch. I use them to separate the snacks when I send her to daycare and also storage too! Easy to clean, so far no leaks and have used them for a variety of foods! Excellent!!
customer_reviews.author: Allie J. S.

customer_reviews.title: Little parts that fall off and get lost.
customer_reviews.text: Really annoying. The little plastic seals that line the inside of the lids are not attached so they fall out during washing and get lost. Once they fall out they expand and become misshapen so they never fit into the lids again. They’re not just one more little piece of plastic I have to keep track off which is the last thing I need.
customer_reviews.author: Molly B

customer_reviews.title: Fit Perfectly in Bottle Warmer
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think that I would like these so much, but I find myself using these more often than actual bowls. These fit perfectly in my bottle warmer, and so I'll heat up purees in these and feed straight from the container. They are a little discolored from the food, but I think that's expected when you feed baby carrots. These are durable and I love OXO products.
customer_reviews.author: Em G.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Starter Containers for Baby Food
customer_reviews.text: I love these containers! I was very intimidated by all of the container choices when I started making baby food, but I’ve ended up ordering 3 sets of these. My 7 month old eats about 3 per day (plus cereal) They really do go from freezer to refrigerator to microwave to dishwasher with ease. I use the Chubbies labels with them.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Cleary

customer_reviews.title: Love these perfect for homemade baby food
customer_reviews.text: Love these little containers they work well and very easy to clean and the color is so adorable! We make our own baby food and this works wonders for storage in both the freezer and fridge. Love the organizer tray, perfect for smaller spaces in your fridge
customer_reviews.author: Tiesha

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for meal prepping small items!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for meal prepping super small portions (nuts, olives, even salad dressings!!) They don't leak, and everything washes up great in the dishwasher (top rack). This is my second set - I needed more since I found so many uses for the first set.
customer_reviews.author: Beth-Mij

customer_reviews.title: Wish more came in a set
customer_reviews.text: The cleanup can get tricky the lid can harbor food and water and that could lead to mold. Other than that, these are great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy little containers
customer_reviews.text: Great for portioning our 2oz, kids snap closed as long as no food gets on top edge preventing a tight seal. One did burn a hole through when I can only imagine my daycare must have put it in microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Godsfield

customer_reviews.title: OK but not great
customer_reviews.text: Love the storage tray. The lid is way too complicated and comes apart while taking it on and off. The portion size is great and I love that they are our markings showing the ounces on the side. The plastic is hard, and I could see where it may break if Dropped or frozen.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect 2oz Containers
customer_reviews.text: I bought these containers for pureed baby food. I have only had them for a couple of days but so far, so good. They are the perfect size and shape. The tray is very convenient for when I need to store them in the freezer. Also easy to clean which is great!
customer_reviews.author: Trina

customer_reviews.title: awesome cute containers
customer_reviews.text: These are great! 5 stars all around!!! I use them to soak and freeze chia seeds to put in hot cereal or in my drink later. They snap closed really good and I have thrown them around without them leaking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't open it after freezing or heating
customer_reviews.text: After I put them on the freezer or try to microwave them, It's so difficult to open them. One just got stuck and I can't open it at all. The top colored part got removed without the rest of the lid ... Apart from that, they are very cute and the size was very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Nathalie Kuoch

customer_reviews.title: Good portion sizes for baby
customer_reviews.text: Bought these storage containers for babies foods. It's the perfect portion size containers. Cleaning them is a little bit of a hassel becasue the food sometimes gets cought between the lid and the lids outter cover. Otherwise I like this product.
customer_reviews.author: Erna C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for weight loss surgery
customer_reviews.text: I just had bariatric surgery, so I can only eat 2 ounces at a time. These are perfect!! I can measure out 1-2 ounces within the cup. They don’t leak, and do well in the microwave. I love the little tray they come with for the fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Darling

customer_reviews.title: good storage container
customer_reviews.text: we make ground cod for my son every weekend and split into six portions with these storage boxes. No leak problems and the defrosted cod in the boxes tastes same as the fresh one~~
customer_reviews.author: Bionoob

customer_reviews.title: Great for dog food too
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to freeze canned pumpkin and sweet potatoes for my pup! They work great. The one thing is that they break easy if they fall out of the freezer.
customer_reviews.author: Pennsylvania Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Love these containers!
customer_reviews.text: These containers are so great. They feel great quality and they keep my baby's food fresh! Unfortunately, one slightly cracked when I dropped it frozen with baby food but you cant blame a product for that. Plastic breaks. Especially frozen. Nothing you can do about it! Cant change science! Great containers I will be buying more in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used to be good, not anymore!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these a few years ago with my first baby and loved them! I’m still using the old supply with my new baby and bought more. These new ones are terrible! They break so easily. I’ve had them a month and 1/2 are broken. The original ones are all still in perfect condition. Not sure what oxo did but now these are terrible! Would definitely not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for baby food
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, I've dropped them frozen and nothing has cracked. Easy to sanitize. Carrots or peas haven't stained them yet. Great purchase and love the tray.
customer_reviews.author: Skylar

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I think these a lot! Perfect for when you are first introducing solids to babies. I would suggest only buying one pack and get the NUK Homemade Baby Food Flexible Freezer Tray molds, these molds are the perfect fit. Plus as baby grows the 2oz will be too small.
customer_reviews.author: L. Ford

customer_reviews.title: Broken tray but does the job
customer_reviews.text: It does work well. I ordered 2 trays However one of the trays arrived broken. Just like the other reviews posted. Other than that this is a good quality and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: L.K

customer_reviews.title: Get it.
customer_reviews.text: Super useful. Just like all the other positive comments. If you think it will make a difference, chances are you’re in the right track!! Get it.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for lunches
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They qre the perfect size for salad dressing or hummus afternoon snack. Never leak - here's to hoping they make these in larger sizes!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great For Grab & Go!
customer_reviews.text: I have been making my son’s baby food and these containers are great! As he has gotten older he eats more, so I may need to buy another set!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for sending baby food to daycare with my 7month old. No leaks so far with over a month of use. Contemplating purchasing more to use for myself to hold salad dressing or condiments.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Leakproof!
customer_reviews.text: The most important thing I was looking for was containers that are leakproof (taking salad dressing with my lunch) and these have been really leakproof. There is an ingenious design that you will see if you buy these containers that makes them leakproof.
customer_reviews.author: Trudgette

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I am not using them for baby food but for paint. It keeps the paint sealed and ready for me to use the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Rosentrater

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for storing baby food
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean and use - no issues after having them for months now. The oz markings on the side make these incredibly efficient for storing baby food.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient!
customer_reviews.text: Omg I love these! I make my daughter's food, and of all the different products I have, these are by far the best. I will be getting the bigger size next time though! Even though she's not there yet, but why buy twice as many.. Comes apart ready to clean
customer_reviews.author: Imanis mommy

customer_reviews.title: No leaks!
customer_reviews.text: No leaks! Great for dressings and peanut butter too if you are looking for a use other than baby food.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome containers, 2oz is quite small
customer_reviews.text: These are great however I didn’t realize how small a 2oz container is, however if that is the size you need you can’t beat these.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Chiaradia

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: amazing quality but a little small. My 6 month old can eat 2 of these at a time. Other the that these are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Garcia

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I love them! Easy to clean, they fit in my avent warmer and and love the rack to keep my baby’s purées organized
customer_reviews.author: Paola Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Too small.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t bother getting this size. Babies outgrow them quickly. Get the 4 oz and they’ll work for now AND later.
customer_reviews.author: M Mcgee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Made my life very easy!! Writing this review while feeding the baby barley and green peas which made and stored two days ago. I don’t use it the freeze, I use silicone cups for that. And I also don’t put them in the dishwasher. They are holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Saundarya Ajit

customer_reviews.title: Good brand with another good product
customer_reviews.text: You can't go wrong with oxo! I use these to freeze baby food. They dont leak and reheat just fine.
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: These are great. They are marked with ounces. They seal great and can be put in the microwave and dishwasher
customer_reviews.author: Pazzolupo

customer_reviews.title: Cute and perfect portion
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had a couple leaks but not sure if my mom didn’t close it right or if it just leaks but I still love them. I love that they have measurements
customer_reviews.author: Allison Lukaszuk

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and quality
customer_reviews.text: Amazing better than expected . The delivery was next day and o can’t wait to send food to my baby to his school on these.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: I use them as baby bowls when going travel. They are leak proof and easy to clean. Each container has about 2 oz.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Jin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to store homemade puree
customer_reviews.text: These worked perfectly for storing puree. I made my own baby food and these were convenient to store in. Perfect serving size to feed baby right out of.
customer_reviews.author: PMcN

customer_reviews.title: Great for baby food
customer_reviews.text: I love this for my child’s first foods! They are the perfect size and easy to transport his homemade baby food. These are a must have
customer_reviews.author: Mama221

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for baby Purees
customer_reviews.text: The oxo Tupperware are perfect for baby purees. I like how they have the measurements on the side. They are very durable and easy to clean. I also love how it comes with the tray so you can put the tupperware on the tray in the fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: Great little containers!
customer_reviews.text: These are great. use them to take liquid in lunch every day. Have not had a leak yet. Great size and close very securely. Nice little containers.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan G

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Just got them yesterday, but they snap close nicely and I love the tray.
customer_reviews.author: ALT

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Does not leak, great size for baby food and easy to store with the tray
customer_reviews.author: Dwanette Stokes

customer_reviews.title: Buy them!
customer_reviews.text: I like these a lot, you’ll definitely need more than one if you plan on making your own baby food! Very easy to store, clean and freeze.
customer_reviews.author: Sheena

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: This are very good storage containers. The only thing I noticed was that depends of the type of your food you put it into, the containers gets spotted.
customer_reviews.author: MayaStein

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: We still use these and I bought them when my baby was under 1 years old. She’s three now. They’re awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Satina Bolton

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: These work well for me and for freezing small portions of food.
customer_reviews.author: Enjoylifepeacefully

customer_reviews.title: Perfect portion containers!
customer_reviews.text: I love these for my baby girl. She has a smaller appetite but loves to eat often. I fill them with all sorts of solids: snacks, mashed vegetables and fruits etc. They never leak and can be frozen too! The trays are so useful because they stack up on top of eachother and don't take up space in the fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for glider food
customer_reviews.text: Love these little containers. They work perfectly for me to store frozen sugar glider food in. It's the exact amount I feed each night. They handle the freeze well. They are dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.author: Audreyajh886

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Good value and well made. Perfect little baby food containers
customer_reviews.author: Jess Richards

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, freeze, thaw, travel. I prefer these to our silicone freezer tray for homemade baby food.
customer_reviews.author: Andoa

customer_reviews.title: Super Helpful
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Helped a lot. Store baby food in them and freeze. Just don’t drop them while frozen. Lid is kinda thin and breaks.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan S.

customer_reviews.title: Great for purees
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for homemade purees. I even froze some and put them in these containers.
customer_reviews.author: Erica DePietro

customer_reviews.title: Excellent baby food storage set
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They have never leaked. They are easy to clean and store. Each storage container is marked up to 2 oz.
customer_reviews.author: ldaniel2

customer_reviews.title: Good for starters
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for little babies that are just starting to taste..
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy and well made set, as are all the products I have purchased from OXO so far. The 6 jars sit securely in the tray and the lids fit tightly. Lid is 2 pieces that disassemble for cleaning. Dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect containers. No issue with leaks. Super easy to clean. Can pop into the dishwasher without taking the lid apart.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlei

customer_reviews.title: Convenient but not durable
customer_reviews.text: They are great little portion sized containers. Only downside is they are not very rugged. The first drop from the counter top and one of them broke. Being a bit of an organization freak it's painfull to see one missing from the handy trays. That empty spot just nags at my ocd haha
customer_reviews.author: brandon

customer_reviews.title: Great for homemade baby food
customer_reviews.text: Great for homemade baby food. I bought a couple of sets so I can make a few different foods at once and then freeze some and refrigerate some. Fits well in the kiinde bottle warmer too, and doesn't leak.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Fetsch

customer_reviews.title: Don’t freeze
customer_reviews.text: The size is great. Easy to put in the dishwasher. When frozen I had two blocks fall out of the freezer. Both of the blocks that fell had the teal part crack and break off. This made the lid unusable. I now have two containers with no lids.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Masi

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. Perfect little containers for my little ones homemade purées

customer_reviews.title: Good price,easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love this container, It is very convenient to store the food I store for my baby, and sometimes I take some milk powder to put in it when I go out,very convenience

product_meta.title: OXO Tot Baby Blocks Food Storage Containers, Teal, 2 Ounce
product_meta.description: Color:TealOxo Tot Baby Blocks give homemade baby food the same care you put into preparing it. Easily portion, store, freeze, heat and serve the meals you've cooked especially for your baby using Baby Block Containers in convenient two ounce size. Six 2 ounce containers fit into the freezing tray and each has measurement markings to make portioning a snap. On the go? The Containers are airtight, watertight and leak proof. Peek at the clear Containers to identify the contents, then pop one into your bag for simple defrosting and feeding when you're out and about with your tot. An Easy open, each shut lid makes the Containers a carefree choice. Convenient storage tray rests flat on a freezer shelf or in a freezer drawer and can be stacked to save space. Microwave and freezer safe. Top rack dishwasher safe. BPA, phthalate and PVC free.
feature_bullets: Portion, store, freeze, heat and serve baby food with ease
Ideal for storing large batches of pureed foods and serving baby on the go
Airtight, watertight, leak proof seal prevents messes; easy motion to open and close
Clear lid and body keeps contents easily visible; Convenient measurement markings indicate portion sizes
Polypropylene body is PVC, BPA, and phthalate free; dishwasher and microwave safe
